name: Panic Highway Racer 3D
description:
It must be an exciting and both dangerous experience to weave through traffic. Ever wanted to rush through the waves of oncoming cars and make your way to victory? Do you have such adrenalin without any danger? Panic Highway Racer 3D is an ambitious game to make you feel this excitement! Be daring and pass close to cars. Avoid crashing at all costs! Put on that helmet, fasten your seatbelts and hit the accelerator. Dodge cars to gain exciting new boosts and shields. Boosts will augment the speed of your car where as shields will prevent you from getting knocked out while driving. Panic Highway Racer 3D is an outstanding game that offers real time driving simulation and realistic physics with a wide choice of cars which will take your driving experience to an all new world. In Panic Highway Racer 3D you can choose your driving style. It can be calm and safety for driving in traffic flow or extreme racing.

Game Modes:

One Way Traffic:
In One Way Traffic mode you will experience the one direction traffic. You are a panic driver so rush through this one way traffic.

Two Way Traffic:
In Two Way Traffic you will face two directional traffic. Drive with expertise to pass through this panic traffic.

Game Features:
- Check Point System
- Attractive and useful power-ups
- Amazing Highway drive Environment
- Realistic Traffic Ai.
- Nice Background Music
- Realistic Car Controls
- Variety of Power Ups
- Multiple player cars

How to Play:
Like a panic racer accelerate your car by touching acceleration button on screen, to avoid collusion use car brakes by touching brake button on screen. Change lanes by tilting your mobile sets left/right. You need to reach the check point in given time. If you reach before time the time will get increase as bonus time.
Collect coins to unlock more cars and to get boosts and shields. Play as much as you can to earn more and more coins. You can also earn incentive coins.
So keep Playing Panic Highway Racer 3D and enjoy the thrilling driving experience in this panic creating traffic. Stay calm and Run.

For more suggestion/feedback feel free to contact us at gamesclanstudio@gmail.com
